testcase.name: testDB

failure.message: The driver could not establish a secure connection to SQL Server by using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) encryption. Error: "SQL Server did not return a response. The connection has been closed. ClientConnectionId:7e4063cb-c48b-44a4-a8bf-017bde10ef61".
